enhanced_by.reason: The render method relies heavily on safelyAppend to write to the OutputStreamWriter, making it a critical method to invoke before render.
Environment setup is required before rendering the output, ensuring all necessary resources are available.
The ol_changed method processes and formats changed operations, which is closely related to the rendering logic in the render method.
The listEndpoints method formats and lists endpoints, which is similar to the rendering logic in the render method.
The ul_response method formats and lists API responses, which is similar to the rendering logic in the render method.
